rows.label: qev092401_MSG0001
rows.name: There you are! Hey, can I borrow you for a sec?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0002
rows.name: Hope's been super glum lately, and it's weirding me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0003
rows.name: You know if anything's up? I'm worried about her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0010
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you have no clue what is bugging Hope.

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Ada that Hope must be mourning Ornella's death.

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Dang. You guys are pretty tight,
so I figured you'd have some idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Still, if you don't have a clue, maybe you
should be the one to inquire?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0006
rows.name:
You know how she isâ€”she'll never ask
for help if we don't pry a LITTLE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Ahh, right... She did say Ornella
was like a mother to her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, she needs to talk about this,
so maybe you can get her to open up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0009
rows.name:
I just want to know if there's any
way we can help her out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0010
rows.name: Thanks. I'm sure she'll open up if it's you asking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0011
rows.name:
All right, off you go!
I'll be cheering you on from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Father... Have I been doing things
wrong this entire time...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh, hello.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0014
rows.name: Sorry, I... I was just thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0030
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Hope that she appears to be on the verge of tears.

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Hope what is wrong.

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0015
rows.name: N-no, I'm fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0016
rows.name:
...Oh, forget it. I'm a mess.
A huge, sloppy mess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0017
rows.name:
How do you always know when I want
someone to talk to? It's like magic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0018
rows.name: What happened to Ornella was ultimately my fault.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0019
rows.name: So now I'm wondering if everything I've been trying to do is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Well, what if all my efforts to help people
burden others in turn?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0021
rows.name:
It's made me scared to help anyone,
and now I'm just paralyzed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0050
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Hope that she is not a burden on anyone.

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0060
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Hope that she is overcomplicating things.

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0022
rows.name:
You're very kind to say that.
But I know it's not true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0023
rows.name: At least not for Ornella...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0025
rows.name:
I should stop, I'm sorry.
The last thing I want to do is be a burden on YOU.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0026
rows.name: I just can't seem to get Ornella's words out of my head.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0027
rows.name: It's like I've started to doubt everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0028
rows.name: Everything I was proud of suddenly feels wrong and gross.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0029
rows.name:
I know my father struggled with this too.
I'd give anything to have his journal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0030
rows.name: But it was lost during the crash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0030_2
rows.name: And now I'm lost too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0031
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0032
rows.name: Anyway, thank you. I feel a bit better after talking it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0033
rows.name: I'll go see if I can help anyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0034
rows.name:
If you take on any missions in the meantime,
though, I'll come running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0035
rows.name:
What's the deal?
She had a weirdly serious look on her face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Did you pick up on any ways
we might be able to cheer her up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0070
rows.name: Divulge

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Ada everything.

rows.label: qev092401_JNK0080
rows.name: Withhold

rows.label: qev092401_SEL0081
rows.name: Keep Hope's words to yourself.

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0037
rows.name: Nice going![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0037_2_m
rows.name: I knew she'd spill the beans to her new best friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0037_2_f
rows.name: I knew she'd spill the beans to her new best friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0038
rows.name: Sooo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Now we just need to track down that journal
she lost during the crash! ...Heh. "Just."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0040
rows.name:
No wonder she tells you things.
You're like a damn bank vault![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Look, you don't have to share the gory details.
Just let me know what I can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0042
rows.name:
...A journal she lost during the crash?
Yowza. That's tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0043
rows.name: Sounds like I've got a top-secret mission to give you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Dig up that journal and return it to her.
Oh, and keep it a surprise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0045
rows.name: It'll be more fun if she doesn't see it coming, so no blabbing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I'll gather up everyone she's helped
and see what we can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092401_MSG0047
rows.name: You'll want to ask around after that journal right away, okay?[ST:wait ]
